info.name: pink gc mode (made to pair)
info.description:
~ made a pink mode for google classroom to pair with another CSS I have installed 
~ looks alr on its own, but I suggest layering it with another CSS
~ the one I used: https://userstyles.org/styles/213685 (my melody google classroom wallpaper)
info.additionalInfo: ~ only the pink elements and text are included in this css
